0110101110101101 1011001100011111 1 -> sum: 0001111011001101, cout: 1
1000001011010000 0101100001000010 1 -> sum: 1101101100010011, cout: 0
1010101100111001 1010110000011000 0 -> sum: 0101011101010001, cout: 1

0011110010011010 0110000010101110 0 -> sum: 1001110101001000, cout: 0
0010110100000101 1101110100110001 1 -> sum: 0000101000110111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
